title: The Cryo Lab
visuals: ASCII_Overlay: The image is clean, high-res code. Elena floats in stasis - just data now.
lighting: Cold blue cryo-light. Clinical white emergency strips. Jax's face half in shadow.
audio: The hum of the cryo-pod, Jax's labored breathing, the beep of life support monitors.
smell: Antiseptic, cold metal, the faint sweetness of cryo-gel.
narrative:
Jax stumbles in. He collapses against the pod. Inside, Elena floats in gel. She is unconscious.
Jax weeps. 'I didn't want you to know. But I can't die here, kid. Not where I killed them. She's got the same blood as me - Type-H. No hospital has it. She's the only one who can save me. Please.'
gmNotes: There is no skill check. The player must choose. This is the moral climax of the adventure.

npcs.name: Jaxson 'Jax' V.
npcs.notes: Collapsed. Begging for his life. His heart is failing.
npcs.motivation: Survival at any cost. He doesn't want to die here, where he killed so many.
npcs.personality: Broken, weeping, desperate. All pretense is gone. He's just a dying man.

npcs.name: Elena (Subject 01)
npcs.notes: In cryo-stasis. Type-H blood. The only compatible donor - Jax needs her heart AND her blood.
npcs.motivation: None. She has been asleep for 15 years. She never knew the massacre happened.
npcs.personality: Peaceful. Dreaming. Her neural link has been broadcasting fragments of her dreams into the local network.

challenges.description: Operate the harvester to transplant Elena's heart to Jax.

success_effect.text: The surgery is clean. Elena flatlines. Jax gasps as her heart begins to beat in his chest.

failure_effect.text: The surgery is rough. Elena dies in pain. Jax survives, but barely. He takes 2 permanent Stress.

triggers.label: Execute Surgery
triggers.text: You activate the harvester. Elena flatlines. Jax lives. He stands up, healthy, but refuses to look at the empty pod. (Gain Aspect: Blood Brothers)

triggers.label: Refuse
triggers.text: You step back. Jax begs, then screams, then fades. He dies looking at Elena's face, realizing he is the villain. You leave the pod running. (Gain Aspect: The Hard Line)
